price: Lukavstva su smišljali i oni prije njih, ali svako lukavstvo pripada Allahu, i On zna šta svako zaslužuje. A nevjernici će sigurno saznati kome će lijep ishod na kraju pripasti.
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ جَمِيعٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖۗ وَسَيَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡكُفَّٰرُ لِمَنۡ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqad makara alladhīna min qablihim falillahi al-makru jamīʿan yaʿlamu mā taksibu kullu nafsin wasayaʿlamu al-kufāru liman ʿuq'bā al-dāri
